verses.roman:
eta bali' mahāprabhu naukāte caḍilā
mūrcchita hañā paṇḍita tathāi paḍilā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; naukāte caḍilā—got on a boat; mūrcchita hañā—fainting; paṇḍita—Gadādhara Paṇḍita Gosvāmī; tathāi—there; paḍilā—fell down.
translation: Saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu got into a boat, and Gadādhara Paṇḍita immediately fell down in an unconscious state.
